Ragnar looks at Aerotaur with a shocked expression.

Ragnar: Thievery?! I am a warrior! What I speak of is a challenge for 
the possession of ressources, not a petty theft! (He calms down, 
because he knows how alien Clan ways may seem to an outsider.) No 
laborers, you say? Civlians then? Any non-warrior castes?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He looks at Ragnar noncommittally.  "What you speak of is 
thievery.  
> Is that not against our code?"  He narrows his eyes to a squint.  
"And I 
> don't believe I've seen any laborers.  Have you?"
